title: New hardware causing issues
body:
Hi I recently updated my graphics card to a gtx 1060 but ever sense then I've had awful fps in league. Any ideas of what might have caused this?

My cpu is a fx 8370
Gpu evga gtx 1060 sc 

Could it be a bottleneck problem?

And help is appreciated!

replies.body: FPS issues can be caused be a variety of factors, with the most common being outdated drivers.  As a first step make sure that everything is up to date!  Go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) issues for a series of steps to tune up your PC.  Hopefully, this will get things running smoothly.  Grats on your new card!

I got home from work tried the suggestions including reinstalling the game but no change. I guess my best bet is waiting for new updates for the card, and dealing with the frame rate for the mean time. thank you for your help.
